about_the_game:
Step into a universe where love blooms across the stars. Fall in love with 8 hentai girls. Evolve your romance, make your own decisions, date, make love and lose yourself in vibrant visuals. Every solved puzzle reveals a piece of the story.

This puzzle video game blends satisfying puzzles with visual storytelling. Experience eight unique characters, each presenting a beautifully crafted love story. As you progress, solve puzzles to unlock new chapters, make meaningful choices in the narrative, and collect stunning artwork in the in-game gallery. Relax to a soothing lofi music player, enchanting the atmosphere of your journey.

Key Features:

  • 80 Levels: Explore a diverse array of visual and thematic challenges.

  • 80 Achievements: Get them all.

  • 3 Puzzle types: Enjoy match puzzles, rotation puzzles and swap puzzles.

  • Gallery: Unlock and revisit beautiful illustrations from the game's stories.

  • Easy Solve button: For when you need a helping hand to keep the story moving.

  • Multiple choices: Shape the direction of each love story.

  • Custom mode: Set your own difficulty and play random puzzles.

  • Lo-Fi music player: Chill out with calming tracks that enhance the immersive atmosphere.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains themes such as nudity, explicit sexual content, sexual acts, blood, violence, BDSM, alcohol and drug consumption and is not suitable for players under 18.
All characters are over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

  • Graphics: 512MB

short_description: Hentai Girls Stories connects visual novel with relaxing puzzles. Evolve your relationships with girls and get to know them while solving puzzles!
